name: Rising Eclipse
description:
Defend the Animal Forest against the Eclipse Clan!

As a loyal spirit of the forest, you have been awakened to defend against the attack of the Eclipse Felines. The Eclipse Clan intends to steal the natural energy of your homeland, putting at risk both you and the numerous animal inhabitants of the forest.

As a spirit, you have a formless body, but you can resonate with the souls of the animal inhabitants, shapeshifting into them. You can use each animal's unique powers to defeat the Eclipse Felines and stop them from destroying the forest.

Game for 2022 May UCA Game Jam
